title: Modern Thesis Template System
description: A comprehensive Vue 3 + Vuetify 3 template system designed specifically for academic thesis applications. Features robust authentication, role-based access control, and automated routing with zero-config development experience.
subtitle: Streamline Your Academic Development with Professional Templates

backgroundImage.alt: Abstract academic background with geometric patterns

features.title: Built-in Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication flow with Supabase integration, including login, registration, password reset, and session management with reactive state.

features.title: Role-Based Auth Guards
features.description: Sophisticated route protection system with user roles, permissions, and automated redirection to ensure secure access to protected resources.

features.title: Auto-Generated Navigation
features.description: File-based routing system that automatically generates navigation menus, breadcrumbs, and route structures from your page components.

features.title: Zero-Config Development
features.description: Extensive plugin automation with auto-imports, component registration, and Vuetify-first UI development for rapid thesis application creation.
